price: 23. (Di dalam surga itu) mereka saling mengulurkan gelas yang isinya tidak (menimbulkan) ucapan yang tidak berfaedah ataupun perbuatan dosa.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
